mapper.insert: insert into ProductTBL(pCode, pCategory, product, pContent, pAmount, pDate, origin) values(#{pCode},#{pCategory},#{product},#{pContent},#{pAmount},#{pDate},#{origin})
mapper.update: update ProductTBL set price=#{price} where pCode=#{pCode}
mapper.select: select * from ProductTBL order by pCode
